00011 #include <iostream>
00012 
00013 namespace DdMd
00014 {
00015 
00022    class Plan
00023    {
00024 
00025    public:
00026 
00027       Plan() :
00028        flags_(0)
00029       {}
00030 
00031       void setExchange(int i, int j)
00032       {  flags_ |= EMask[i][j]; }
00033  
00034       void clearExchange(int i, int j)
00035       {  flags_ &= (~EMask[i][j]); }
00036  
00037       void setGhost(int i, int j)
00038       {  flags_ |= GMask[i][j]; }
00039  
00040       void clearGhost(int i, int j)
00041       {  flags_ &= (~GMask[i][j]); }
00042 
00043       void setFlags(unsigned int flags)
00044       {  flags_ = flags; }
00045  
00046       void clearFlags()
00047       {  flags_ = 0; }
00048  
00049       bool exchange(int i, int j) const
00050       {  return bool(flags_ & EMask[i][j]); }
00051  
00052       bool ghost(int i, int j) const
00053       {  return bool(flags_ & GMask[i][j]); }
00054  
00055       unsigned int flags() const
00056       {  return flags_; }
00057 
00058       // friends:
00059       friend std::istream& operator >> (std::istream& in, Plan &plan);
00060       friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& out, const Plan &plan);
00061  
00062    private:
00063 
00064       unsigned int flags_;
00065  
00066       static unsigned int GMask[3][2];
00067       static unsigned int EMask[3][2];
00068 
00069    };
00070 
00078    std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, Plan &plan);
00079 
00089    std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const Plan &plan);
00090 
00091 }
00092 #endif
